bookValue - Variable in class ePortfolio.Investment
variable for an invesments bookvalue
buy(int, double) - Method in class ePortfolio.Investment
This abstract method will perform a buy on an investment
buy(int, double) - Method in class ePortfolio.MutualFund
This method performs a mutual fund buy, adding the quantity bought to the previous quantity of the mutual fund, updating price at the time of purchase, and calculates the bookvalue for the mutual with no fee, adding it to the previous bookValue
buy(int, double) - Method in class ePortfolio.Stock
This method performs a stock buy, adding the quantity bought to the previous quantity of the stock, updating price at the time of purchase, and calculates the bookvalue for the stock with fee of 9.99, adding it to the previous bookValue
buyInvestments(String, String, String, int, double) - Method in class ePortfolio.Portfolio
This methods allows the user to buy a stock or a mutual fund

getBookValue() - Method in class ePortfolio.Investment
This method will return the current value of the investment's book value
getGain(int, double) - Method in class ePortfolio.MutualFund
This method calculates the theoretical gain of a mutual fund (as if it were a full sale) and returns it to be printed in main (sale fee of 45.00 included)
getGain(int, double) - Method in class ePortfolio.Stock
This method calculates the theoretical gain of a stock (as if it were a full sale) and returns it to be printed in main (sale fee of 9.99 included)
getInvestmentGain() - Method in class ePortfolio.Portfolio
This methods allows user to check there current gain of all their stocks and mutual funds

searchInvestments(String, String, String, String) - Method in class ePortfolio.Portfolio
This method allows users to search for stocks and mutual funds with 3 filters: symbol, keywords and range
SearchPanel - Class in ePortfolio

SearchPanel(Portfolio) - Constructor for class ePortfolio.SearchPanel
Constructs SearchPanel for the GUI
sell(int, double, ArrayList<Investment>, int) - Method in class ePortfolio.Investment
This abstract method will perform a sale on an investment
sell(int, double, ArrayList<Investment>, int) - Method in class ePortfolio.MutualFund
This method performs a mutual fund sell, either partial or full if the quanitity parameter is not larger than the quantity of mutual fund owned FULL SALE: sets quantity and bookValue to zero and removes mutual fund PARTIAL SALE: sets remaining quanitity after sale, updates price to the price at which mutual fund was sold, and calculates the book value of the mutual fund remaining
sell(int, double, ArrayList<Investment>, int) - Method in class ePortfolio.Stock
This method performs a stock sell, either partial or full if the quanitity parameter is not larger than the quantity of stock owned FULL SALE: sets quantity and bookValue to zero and removes stock PARTIAL SALE: sets remaining quanitity after sale, updates price to the price at which stock was sold, and calculates the remaining book value of the stock
sellInvestments(String, int, double) - Method in class ePortfolio.Portfolio
This methods allows the user to sell a stock or a mutual fund
